summary:
It is a male follower who is essential (invincible) and kicks ass!
You can find him next to the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
It is a male breton follower who is essential (invincible) and kicks ass!You can find him next to the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood
He has some funny lines like "Hey my hangover is gone!" when you cast healing hands at him
Works with any follower mod like AFT and its lore friendly!
Let me know what you think (it is my first mod)

Check out my Youtube channel for skyrim and csgo content!Â 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCno56DfJAl5aYDNBRgTA7ow









[b][i][u](Ps. He is always drunk)[/u][/i][/b]
